info.name: Old YouTube Player Errors
info.description: This will add the old YouTube Player errors to the Polymer Layout.
info.additionalInfo: Note that it may look off at times but this is a problem with YouTube itself. Sometimes they add full stops at the end of sentences and sometimes they do not. This is why sometimes you will see two; The Sorry about that text has a full stop and a space to make the ones without a full stop not look awkward.
